events.title: Build DAPPs
events.details: The world is being more and more decentralized. How do products envolve in such a place? Join us and learn form Robert how to develop the best best decentralized applications.

events.title: Hackathon
events.details: What would you do if you have your own blockchain? Let's forge our chains and build our own decentralized applications. Beer and refreshments are provided.

events.title: Bootcamp
events.details: Blockchain is getting more and more popular. If you want to learn more about this amazing techonology, join us in this one month crash course and master Blockchain!

events.title: BlockchainConnect
events.details: This conference gathers the experts from all all over the world, specializing in different areas of blockchain, to give you insights on the technologies and busienss that are happening.
